description: ඉක්මනින් විකිණීම සඳහා Toyota has delivered quality for years and this car is no exception. This Toyota Hilux Vigo  2006 4d  has travelled a total of 188000km and features a Manual transmission system as well as other great features. Priced at Rs.4800000, this car is fantastic value for money. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Toyota Hilux Vigo  2006
